mushroomBlockade.scenario: You step into a clearing of towering mushrooms. Their glowing caps slowly swivel... tracking your every movement. The ground hums beneath your feet

balanced: Ask the mushrooms for safe passage

snailParade.scenario: You've stumbled into the 14th Annual Snail Procession. Tiny banners wave. The snails are... very serious about this.

safe: Wait respectfully for them to pass
balanced: Become overly enthusiastic and cheer them on

gorestGiants.scenario: Ancient forest giants lie across the trail, snoring loud enough to shake leaves from trees. One clutches a glowing weapon that looks... extremely stealable

balanced: Attempt to steal the glowing weapon

wolfGuardian.scenario: A giant wolf wearing armor and holding a massive sword blocks your path.

safe: Challenge him to an honorable duel
balanced: Throw a stick to distract him
risky: Approach gently and offer to pet him

angryShroombear.scenario: A massive Shroombear rears up, claws flashing in the moonlight.

safe: Punch in bravely in the stomach
risky: Stand tall and attempt to indimidate it

mirrorImage.scenario: You reach a crystal-clear pond where your reflection climbs out of the water, intent on taking your place in the real world.

safe: Fight your reflection in a duel where you must move in perfect sync
balanced: Sacrifice your 'Reflection' (you'll never have one again) to make it disappear
risky: Confuse it by making the stupidest face possible until it loses its form

goblinInterns.scenario: Three goblins in oversized business suits hand out aggressively professional flyers.

safe: Take a flyer and encourage them
balanced: Listen to their painfully long sales pitch

sadCheeseSeller.scenario: A tiny mouse chef sits behind a lonely cheese cart. 'No one believes in artisinal forest cheese anymore...'

trappedOgre.scenario: An ogre has fallen into a deep pit. 'HEY... a little help here?' A glowing potion sits just outside the hole

safe: Help him climb out using vines
balanced: Steal the potion while he's distracted
risky: Pretend you didn't see anything and keep moving

abandonedCart.scenario: You find a cart, seemingly abandoned, full of potions.

safe: Ignore the cart and move on, it's not ours
balanced: Pocket one potion from the edge of the cart
risky: Grab as many potions as you can carry

greedyKing.scenario: A golden statue blocks the path, it's mouth open; it will only move if it 'tastes' something incredibly valuable

safe: lose the ability to choose answer one
balanced: lose the ability to choose answer two
risky: lose the ability to choose answer three

frogMerchant.scenario: A whimsical frog in a tiny coat sits behind a crooked wooden stall. 'Greetings, travelers... care to improve your survival odds? I have a few items available.'

safe: Sprint Boots - Gain extra time on one future decision
balanced: Anti-Wizard Bell - Cancel one sabotage attempt
risky: Toad Alarm Clock - Reveals which option is safest in a future scenario
